content: **puff glorious puff ** this flattering slouchy beanie suits most women you can crochet this cosy and comfortable beanie with a basic affordable solid colour australian 8 ply dk/no 3 weight for a special gift a colourful yarn like patons sierra also looks lovely this beanie is worked top down in a continuous round so there is no seam the body of the beanie is entirely puff for a material that is warm but not tightly fitted and has a bit of slouch at the back the all about the puff slouchy has a shaped band made with camel half_double_crochet which is snug fitting but still has some stretch and is not uncomfortably tight around your ears this pattern is not for absolute beginners but it will suit more confident adventurous beginners because the detailed video tutorial explains each step slowly i have also included some photographs in written pattern to make the steps clear for more advanced crocheters this is a simple pattern that will work up quickly so it s great for last minute gifts
